about_the_game:
The game is about making precise, quick actions and smart decisions.

  • 77 unique amazing levels. I have squeezed all the juice out of this game concept and continue to polish it, making each level more complex and interesting to solve.

  • Levels are not about waiting, but about running, spinning, taking risks and destroying. The density of gaming situations will not let you get bored.

  • All office furniture is destroyable, but be smart, because it also serves as a kind of protection for co-workers from dragon heartburn.

  • Everything will fly away in your path and funky music will not let you get bored.

  • Don't harm dragon's co-workers with his heartburn! Otherwise you will have to start the level over again!

  • ~3 hours to complete the game (depends on skill).

name: Dragon Heartburn Demo
short_description: That pizza at lunch was a mistake... Dragon Heartburn is a mix of a top-down shooter and a puzzle game. The dragon gets heartburn in the middle of the workday and needs to get to the infirmary without harming his co-workers!
